Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18733814.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Dine on New England comfort food and classic seafood dishes in a gastropub-inspired restaurant that’s reminiscent of a cozy lighthouse.

Item.Name: Ale & Compass Lounge
Item.Content:
Ale and Compass Lounge in Disney's Yacht Club Resort, Disney's Yacht Club Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Ale and Compass Lounge

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001228.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Find yourself here for a beer! High-end liquors are poured at this nautical nook in the evening, along with such cocktails as the Captain’s Daiquiri. Enjoy light snacks like the fruit and cheese board and coffee and pastries in the morning.
  Cuisine: American

Details, tips, and information for Cape May Cafe

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001347.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Coast on down to this New England-style, beachside setting where you can join some favorite Disney pals at breakfast for a lively Character Dining experience, or set sail later in the day for a mouthwatering seafood-and-more dinner buffet. Please note: Disney Characters join Guests for breakfast only.

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001433.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
